entry.string: The Modules Module controls the modules that you have installed on your Xaraya System. It basically controls the install, upgrades, and removal of modules.
entry.translation: Modul-modulet styrer de moduler, du har installeret på dit Xaraya-system. Grundlæggende styrer det installationen, opgraderingen og fjernelsen af moduler.

entry.string: From the menu, you have two choices. "View", and "Configure Hooks".
entry.translation: Fra menuen har du to muligheder: "Vis" og "Sæt bindinger op".

entry.string: View -- Allows you to see what modules are currently installed on your system, and the current state that they are in.
entry.translation: Vis -- Viser dig hvilke moduler, der er installeret på dit system samt disses aktuelle tilstand.

entry.string: Configure Hooks -- Allows you to set certain hooks for modules to be reused (such as allowing comments on a module's data)
entry.translation: Sæt bindinger op -- Giver dig mulighed for at genbruge visse bindinger for moduler (såsom at tillade kommentarer til et moduls data)

entry.string: The Modules Module has no blocks included at this time.
entry.translation: Der følger ingen blokke med modul-modulet.

entry.string: The Modules Module has no hooks included at this time.
entry.translation: Der følger ingen bindinger med modul-modulet.

entry.string: Extended information about this module can be found here. [modules module]
entry.translation: Yderligere oplysninger om dette modul kan findes her. [modules module]
